entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Create a manual test for #16986 #17014
  • Nested CollectionView blocks selection in parent #17013
  • Image in CollectionView renders white or black occasionally on Android #17011
  • Unable to Update iOS SwipeGesture Direction at Runtime #17010
  • Unnecessary Compiler rebuilds #17005
  • The initial child element of the Grid Layout occupies the entire height of the layout. #17000
    Backlog
  • The default sample program cannot enter debugging, does not report errors, and is stuck. #16998
  • Grid - HeightRequest and WidthRequest is not setting properly in SizeChanged event #16995

Closed

  • Incorrect Arrangement of Children in Grid Layout #16999
  • [regression/8.0.0-preview.7.8842] Maui MenuFlyOut Crashes #16663
    .NET 8 GA
  • Viquloc #16920
  • Updating shell Tab title doesn't work via Hot Reload / code behind #15659
    .NET 8 GA
  • Entry Control does not accepting numeric inputs when Android language set to Arabic #16429
    Under Consideration
  • [regression/8.0-preview5] Entry not working when keyboard is numeric and os language is not english #15884
    .NET 8 GA
  • DisplayPromptAsync : Keyboard.Numeric broken in release mode #11865
    Under Consideration
  • [cr_AutofillHintsService] java.lang.NullPointerException: Attempt to get length of null array #16994
  • [Android] BoxView Opacity not working #12211
    Backlog
  • Opacity set in xaml becomes the maximum value during animation #11499
    Backlog
  • [Android] Animation on Opacity Issue #16729
    Backlog
  • IsVisible Property not update in ListView #10303
    Backlog
  • [regression/7.0] MAUI Buttons IsVisible=true don't display them after upd. Image element many times on Android #16718
    .NET 8 + Servicing
  • IsVisible binding not showing items again if Shadow is set #15357
  • MAUI project iOS simulator startup failed MT7091 #16886
  • I'm encountering issues while using databases like MySQL and MSSQL when running my project on a mobile device. #16934
  • [regression/8.0] `.xaml.cs` file nesting doesn't work on first build #16501
    .NET 8 GA
  • Dropping files into CollectionView not working on Mac Catalyst #16979
    Backlog
  • codesign exited with code 1 #16948
  • CollectionView cause Intent memory Leak #11866
    .NET 8 + Servicing
  • .NET MAUI Problem with ListView/CollectionView on iOS #12071
    .NET 8 + Servicing
  • PickMultipleAsync is not working on IOS .net 7 #14270
    .NET 8 + Servicing
  • [Android] The measure and arrange methods are not being called in custom layout inside the Shell TabBar. #16361
    .NET 8 + Servicing
  • [regression/8.0.0-preview.6] Image not loading #16364
    .NET 8 GA
  • ScrollView sizing issue in Grids in iOS #16456
    .NET 8 + Servicing
  • Preferences.Get(string key, bool defaultValue) fails on Android #16509
    .NET 8 + Servicing
  • RadioButton initialisation makes multiple groups unusable #16724
    .NET 8 + Servicing
  • [regression/8.0.0-preview.5.8529] [Android] ListView doesn't get rendered #15826
    .NET 8 GA
  • [regression/7.0.92] DataTemplate is very slow when created in code behind on Android #16805
    .NET 7 + Servicing
  • [regression/7.0.92] Button Content Layout goes wrong on Android #16806
    .NET 7 + Servicing

PullRequests

Created

  • [WinUI] Fix borders not showing bottom and right side #17016
  • [android] CollectionView logical children grows with Header/Footer #17012
  • [release/8.0.1xx-rc1] Merge net8.0 to 8.0.1xx-rc1 #17007
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️, .NET 8 GA
  • [core] factory methods for registering services, part 2 #17004
    area/perf 🏎️, area/hosting 🧩
  • Ignore failures from newly added UITests temporarily #17003
  • Fix for Spinner not disappearing in RefreshView #16997
    area/controls 🎮, control-refreshview, i/regression

Merged

  • [net8.0] Bump net7 version #17009
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [net8.0] Merge main to net8.0 #17006
    area/infrastructure 🏗️, .NET 8 GA
  • Fix Flyout Crash (Windows) #16800
    platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-flyout, i/regression, .NET 8 GA
  • [Windows] Notify Shell tab title changes #16593
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/shell 🐢, .NET 8 GA
  • [Android] Fix Keyboard.Numeric issue #16163
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-dialogalert, area/keyboard, .NET 8 GA
  • Add Windows unpackaged DeviceTests in CI #17001
    platform/windows 🪟, area/testing
  • [workload] Move default item updates to workload sdk #16990
  • Default paths for Appium projects, to simplify run steps #16763
    area/testing
  • Use a fixed WinUI window size for Appium test app #16956
    area/testing
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #16993
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [android] fix DI registration for Frame, ListView, TableView #16989
  • [android] Fixed ListView visibility and opacity on Android #16941
    area/ListView

Updated

  • Fix Android text alignment in migrated projects #16986
    platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮
  • Add GetPosition method to DragStartingEventArgs, DragEventArgs, and DropEventArgs #16335
    platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, area/gestures, .NET 8 GA
  • Wrap Image with a grid on Windows so that it is centered with AspectFill #15122
    area/controls 🎮, control-image, Under Consideration
  • Update Page API docs #16981
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [RC1] Implement Platform Args for Drag and Drop EventArgs #16962
    platform/macOS 🍏, platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, area/gestures, area/platform
  • [macOS] Implement IsEnabled property in MenuFlyoutItems #14920
    t/bug, platform/macOS 🍏, area/controls 🎮, control-contextmenu, .NET 8 GA
  • [iOS] Changes in Border clipping part #15856
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-border, i/regression, .NET 8 GA
  • Windows CollectionView TapGesture from keyboard #16952
    area/collectionview 📃
  • Add a template for multi-head maui apps #16988
    area/templates 📄
  • Rename Accelerator to KeyboardAccelerator #16740
    area/keyboard, .NET 8 GA
  • [ios] fix memory leak in SearchBar #16383
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/perf 🏎️, memory-leak 💦, .NET 8 GA
  • Avoid NRE if no shell items are visible #16946
    area/shell 🐢
  • Fix text toolbar item icon not removed when navigating on Android #16796
    community ✨, Under Consideration
  • Add SetupContent/UnhookContent to WinUI ListView.CellControl #16977
    area/ListView
  • Add MaxLength limit to cursor position updates #15970
    area/controls 🎮, community ✨, control-entry, Under Consideration
  • Fix blurry FontImageSource icons in iOS Tab Bar and buttons #16864
    area/image :framed_picture:, .NET 8 GA
